name: v0.2.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "awk.bzl", version = "0.2.2")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Not currently supported.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/alexeagle/awk.bzl/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2

body:

## What's Changed
* chore: green up CI by @alexeagle in https://github.com/alexeagle/awk.bzl/pull/1
* chore: delete unused code by @alexeagle in https://github.com/alexeagle/awk.bzl/pull/2
* Add more explanation for examples by @alexeagle in https://github.com/alexeagle/awk.bzl/pull/3

## New Contributors
